title: Spontaneous
author: Spontaneous
content: One thing that I really love this forum cause I gained more knowledge. Even some high rank on here correcting me an I'm glad that there doing like this ,and maybe could  other felt like that they are really good or pretentious but my perspectives they do correcting and suggest other's cause they are concern and they love their low rank freind.   Beside we can earn we can master here in how to trade and invest and it's really important that we learn on this.    Before that I really don't know what is Bitcoin I think my mind is blowing until I'll start researching one by one and it's really pay off on my learning.   Even I've learned more things in here I'm always remain who I am Cause I believe being humble magnifies who really we are.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PM   One thing that I really love this forum cause I gained more knowledge. It's a very important line when you're a newbie, don't think about what you'll earn here, instead, think about the knowledge that you may absorb and learn that may use to improve your skills in crypto and I'm glad to hear that in you. Many of us here love to join technical discussions, to learn and gain knowledge.  This forum is very helpful to us and as long as you've followed the rules and guidelines you are safe here.Respect for each other would be a result of a good community which we applied here. Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PM  Even I've learned more things in here I'm always remain who I am Cause I believe being humble magnifies who really we are.Keep it up and be a good Samaritan.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PMEven some high rank on here correcting me an I'm glad that there doing like this.This is a form of their concern for low-ranking users so that they do not continue to make the same mistakes. Accepting correction will encourage you to be even better. The Bitcointalk forum has many high-ranking users who are always ready to guide you to gain knowledge in order to improve your ability to continue to have integrity in the forum.Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PMBeside we can earn we can master here in how to trade and invest and it's really important that we learn on this. The will to continue to learn must always be planted in you, there is a lot of knowledge that you can use as capital to continue to be in the forum. One thing you should avoid, never make forums your main job, because forums do not give you a guarantee that you can continue to make money.

comments.author: witcher_sense
comments.body: Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PMEven I've learned more things in here I'm always remain who I am Cause I believe being humble magnifies who really we are.This forum is a great place to gain knowledge about bitcoin and all related stuff, including the technical and economic parts. Even if you are really new to bitcoin and have no idea about computer science, programming, or game theory, people here are always happy to point you in the right direction for where you can find more information about the topic that you don't fully understand. So, don't be afraid of asking good questions, but before doing so, use the search button because it is likely that someone already has asked the same question and been given a helping hand. Google or forum search may save you time, but, what is more important, when you do your own research before asking a question, you save the time of others. But please, try to never ask for financial advice because there are no financial consultants or experts here, so don't expect people to give you the right answer to where you should put your money. If you lose money following someone's bad advice, you will blame that person but not yourself, which is both unjust and counterproductive.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PMEven I've learned more things in here I'm always remain who I am Cause I believe being humble magnifies who really we are.There is nothing to be boast about when you learned a lot. Being humble and lowkey is an essential personality here. Not because someone becomes legendary or get a high status, should act like some form of higher ops or authority. Everyone here are equal regardless of our status or rank. Even newbie should be given respect and not those only high ranking.

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on October 11, 2022, 06:25:47 AMQuote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PMEven I've learned more things in here I'm always remain who I am Cause I believe being humble magnifies who really we are.There is nothing to be boast about when you learned a lot. Being humble and lowkey is an essential personality here. Not because someone becomes legendary or get a high status, should act like some form of higher ops or authority. Everyone here are equal regardless of our status or rank. Even newbie should be given respect and not those only high ranking.  With that, respect is all we need so that this forum will continue to function as a potential outlet for learning, earning is just a bonus. So regardless of your rank or position, as long as you did your part through sharing quality posts, you will always be acknowledged. This forum is not just a place for learning, but it’s definitely a perfect place too where you can find circle of new friends whom you can share same interests and beliefs.

With that, respect is all we need so that this forum will continue to function as a potential outlet for learning, earning is just a bonus. So regardless of your rank or position, as long as you did your part through sharing quality posts, you will always be acknowledged. This forum is not just a place for learning, but it’s definitely a perfect place too where you can find circle of new friends whom you can share same interests and beliefs.. RESPECT is the best.Indeed mate respect to everyone of us here inn forum is the only reason why is this forum live long and long.  And also through respect to everyone of us makes this forum clean and far away from trash talkers. Even though how far you already achieve but always remember that when you respect your juniors you will be more respectful in their eyes.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Spontaneous on October 10, 2022, 10:28:34 PM   One thing that I really love this forum cause I gained more knowledge.[/b]The forum is truly an amazing place to gain knowledge about crypto. Another point is interesting; themes in newcomers are repeated in meaning, and I wonder what motivates their creators?Viral? Wasn't there a similar thread recently? Love and interest in the forum, as the idea of creating a topic is the same, the difference is only in the name.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5386209.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5416488.msg61089156#msg61089156

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Quote from: Shamm on October 11, 2022, 03:00:14 PMRESPECT is the best.Indeed mate respect to everyone of us here inn forum is the only reason why is this forum live long and long.  And also through respect to everyone of us makes this forum clean and far away from trash talkers. Even though how far you already achieve but always remember that when you respect your juniors you will be more respectful in their eyes. This is the reason this forum has been alive for a long time, we can't develop without the help of other users, mutual respect and respect for fellow users has been instilled in this forum for a long time.For me this forum is very special because not just anyone can easily master something on the forum, when in this position it is highly recommended to hear guidance from a senior to understand all the material contained in the forum. Users who are more senior always respect Junior or Newbie, they never feel tired of answering at length every question from their Junior. The Respect attitude of Senior users is very helpful for new users to adapt here, not necessarily outside the forum there are those who want to guide us properly from A to Z.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Finestream on October 11, 2022, 06:48:17 AMThis forum is not just a place for learning, but it’s definitely a perfect place too where you can find circle of new friends whom you can share same interests and beliefs.Yes having some guys who have shared same interest and understand one another is a healthy vibes here in forum. I think even theres a disagreement about certain opinion, a user should not get highly emotional and get mad to someone for opposing his ideals. Thats normal and we dont have same opinion about a lot of things.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Let me talk about one factors that kills most which is "overconfidence" this begins to manifest unnoticed to the member especially whenever they had a first hit attempt that got them credits of recognition, but we are all humans and learn to forget things easily and this makes such individuals to begin to asssume they've arrived already, one cannot be a jack ot all trade, there are sone aspect you don't know about and some you quite have a good knowledge in, this lies in the ability to discern which, what and when to talk or appear, because it could be assumed that any off point made could indirectly serve as spamming too and the moderators could easily delete or place such on off topic, it is very crucial that everyone should be theirselves and not be too over confidence in whatsoever they do on the forum.
